#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define fi first
#define se second
ll mpow(ll a, ll n,ll mod)
{ll ret=1;ll b=a;while(n) {if(n&1)
    ret=(ret*b)%mod;b=(b*b)%mod;n>>=1;}
return (ll)ret;
}
using namespace std;
#define sd(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define pd(x) printf("%d",x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld",x)
#define mem(x,a) memset(x,a,sizeof(x))
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define all(v) v.begin(),v.end()
#define N (int)(1e5+255)
ll C[54][54],mod=1e9+7,fac[54];
void comb(){
    C[0][0]=1;
    for(int i=1;i<=51;i++){
        for(int j=0;j<=i;j++){
            if(i==1||j==0){
                C[i][j]=1;
                continue;
            }
            C[i][j]=(C[i-1][j-1]+C[i-1][j])%mod;
        }
    }
    fac[0]=1;
    for(int i=1;i<=51;i++){
        fac[i]=(fac[i-1]*i)%mod;
    }
}
void solve(){
    int n,k;
    sd(n);sd(k);
    for(int i=1;i<=n-1;i++){
        int x,y;
        sd(x);sd(y);
    }
    ll ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
        ll lca=C[n-1][i-1];
        ll col=C[k][i];
        ll ways=fac[i];
        lca=(lca*col)%mod;
        ans=(ans+(lca*ways)%mod)%mod;
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
}
int main(){
   //freopen("C-large-practice.IN","r",stdin);
   //freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
   comb();
   int t=1;
   sd(t);
   for(int i=1;i<=t;i++){
       //printf("Case #%d:\n",i);
       solve();
   }
   return 0;
}
